authenticate

boolean authenticate(java.lang.String login,
                     java.lang.String pass)
Authenticates a user by his login and pass.

Parameters:
login - login name
pass - clear text password
Returns:
true if pass encryption equals stored encrypted pass

authenticate

boolean authenticate(User user,
                     java.lang.String pass)
Authenticates a user with some pass.

Parameters:
user - user instance
pass - clear text password
Returns:
true if clearPass encryption equals stored encrypted pass
